Uses of DocumentBEs in qqa
 

Methods in qqa with parameters of type DocumentBEs
private static java.lang.Double QQA.assessCoverage(DocumentBEs answer)
          returns the coverage of a be, based on the coverage of its answer
private static java.lang.Double QQA.assessNovelty(java.lang.String be, SentenceBEs sBE, DocumentBEs aBE, java.util.Vector<DocumentBEs> answers)
          returns the coverage of a be, that is the percentage of answers containing the be among those answering the same question as the one the be is being extracted returns the novelty of the be, that is the percentage of sentences among all sentences in all answers to the questions (except the sentence itself) that do not contain the be.
private static java.lang.Double QQA.assessQuality(DocumentBEs answer, java.lang.Double minQuality, java.lang.Double maxQuality)
          returns the quality of a be, based on the quality of its answer and the quality of the best worst answer to the same question
static java.lang.Double TEST_QQA.assessRelevance(java.lang.String be, SentenceBEs sBE, DocumentBEs question)
          returns the relevance of a be to its question
private static java.lang.Double QQA.assessRelevance(java.lang.String be, SentenceBEs sBE, DocumentBEs question)
          returns the relevance of a be to its question
 

Method parameters in qqa with type arguments of type DocumentBEs
static java.lang.Double TEST_QQA.assessCoverage(java.lang.String be, SentenceBEs sBE, java.util.Vector<DocumentBEs> answers)
          returns the coverage of a be, that is the percentage of answers containing the be among those answering the same question as the one the be is being extracted
private static java.lang.Double QQA.assessNovelty(java.lang.String be, SentenceBEs sBE, DocumentBEs aBE, java.util.Vector<DocumentBEs> answers)
          returns the coverage of a be, that is the percentage of answers containing the be among those answering the same question as the one the be is being extracted returns the novelty of the be, that is the percentage of sentences among all sentences in all answers to the questions (except the sentence itself) that do not contain the be.

Fields in qqa.be with type parameters of type DocumentBEs
 java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,DocumentBEs> BETable.table
          table containing a string id for each document in the dataset (answer or question) and the corresponding BEs and Equivalence classes
